Find stable bimodal systems

stab_bgamma.Rd

Produces random matrices and determines whether or not they are stable using eigenanalysis given two different component response rates of 1.95 and 0.05 over some number of iterations

stab_bgamma(S = 200, C = 0.05, Osd = 0.4, iters = 10000)

Arguments

S

Size of the complex system
C

Connectedness of complex system
Osd

Standard deviation of interaction strength
iters

Number of random matrices to simulate

Value

A table showing whether matrices are unstable (0) or stable (1) before (column 1) and after (column 2) including variation in component response rate in eigenanalysis for some number (rows) of random matrices.

Examples

dat <- stab_bgamma(iters = 4);
#> [1] 4 0 0
#> [1] 3 0 0
#> [1] 2 0 0
#> [1] 1 0 0
